comment.brief: Renders normally within the current UI
comment.full: Renders normally within the current UI

comment.brief: Acts are though the viewport were not there, the children render as if in a normal Element parent
comment.full: Acts are though the viewport were not there, the children render as if in a normal Element parent

comment.brief: The viewport renders to a texture. This also has the effect of clipping to the Viewport size.
comment.full: The viewport renders to a texture. This also has the effect of clipping to the Viewport size.

comment.brief: Specifies how the `Viewport` behaves with respect to rendering
comment.full: Specifies how the `Viewport` behaves with respect to rendering
